snippet: The arrival of the Emirati troops threatened to escalate a regional struggle that is believed to be a proxy battle between Iran and the monarchies of the Persian Gulf.
abstract: United Arab Emirates sends ground troops to help fight against Houthi revels in Yemen, move that could add to tensions between Iran and monarchies in region.

byline.original: By SAEED AL-BATATI and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Saeed Al-Batati reported from Al-Mukalla, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The arrival of the Emirati troops threatened to escalate a regional struggle that is believed to be a proxy battle between Iran and the monarchies of the Persian Gulf.

headline.main: Foreign Ground Troops Join Yemen Fight
headline.print_headline: Foreign Ground Troops Join Yemen Fight
